name: Ensure Elasticache Redis clusters have automatic failover enabled.
description: Ensure Elasticache Redis OSS cache clusters use automatic failover.

name: Ensure Elasticache Cluster is not using a public subnet
description: Ensure Elasticache Cluster is not using a public subnet

name: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache cluster has automatic backups enabled.
description: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache cluster has automatic backups enabled.

name: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache cluster has Multi-AZ enabled.
description: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache cluster has Multi-AZ enabled.

name: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache clusters have in transit encryption enabled.
description: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache clusters have in transit encryption enabled.

name: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache clusters have at rest encryption enabled.
description: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache clusters have at rest encryption enabled.

name: Ensure Elasticache Elasticache Redis replication groups of earlier versions should have Redis OSS AUTH enabled.
description: Ensure Elasticache Redis replication groups of earlier versions use Redis OSS AUTH.

name: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache clusters have automatic minor upgrades enabled.
description: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache clusters have automatic minor upgrades enabled.
